subject: fix(ui): update tagline, fix pill overlap, add Vercel deploy info
body:
Replace professional tagline with the full "Jack of all trades" proverb.
Fix DebugBanner pill overlapping UpdatePrompt toast by shifting the
debug banner upward when a PWA update is available. Add mention of
backend auto-deploying to Vercel on push/merge to main in the About
section text.

Tags: ui, content, pwa, debug
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-polish
Semver: patch
